column1: Be the change you wish to see in the world. - Mahatma Gandhi
The journey of a thousand miles begins with a single step. - Lao Tzu
Don't judge each day by the harvest you reap but by the seeds you plant. - Robert Louis Stevenson
The best and most beautiful things in the world cannot be seen or even touched - they must be felt with the heart. - Helen Keller
Doubt kills more dreams than failure ever will. - Suzy Kassem
Life is what happens when you're busy making other plans. - John Lennon
The only person you are destined to become is the person you decide to be. - Ralph Waldo Emerson
The difference between ordinary and extraordinary is that little extra. - Jimmy Johnson
Don't limit yourself. Many people limit themselves to what they think they can do. You can go as far as your mind lets you. Push yourself. - Michael Jordan
You can't wait for inspiration to come to you. You have to go out and get it. - Jack London
To love and be loved is to feel the sun from both sides. - David Viscott
A successful marriage requires falling in love many times
column2: always with the same person. - Mignon McLaughlin

column1: Doubt kills more dreams than failure ever will. - Suzy Kassem
Absence makes the heart grow fonder. - Thomas Gray
We loved with a love that was more than love. - Edgar Allan Poe
Love is friendship that has caught fire. - Ann Landers
The only true wisdom is in knowing you know nothing. - Socrates
Silence is often the best response to a fool. - Mark Twain
It is not the man who has too little
column2: but the man who craves more

column1: The unexamined life is not worth living. - Socrates
The journey of a thousand miles begins with a single step. - Lao Tzu
To get the full value of joy you must have someone to share it with. - Mark Twain
Growing old together is the greatest adventure. - J.B. Priestley
You don't fall in love with someone because they're perfect
column2: but because they bring out the perfect in you. - Bob Marley

column1: Love is a force more formidable than any other. It can turn the tide of battle
column2: it can rearrange the constellations. - C.S. Lewis

column1: The difference between ordinary and extraordinary is that little extra. - Jimmy Johnson
The only person you are destined to become is the person you decide to be. - Ralph Waldo Emerson
The best and most beautiful things in the world cannot be seen or even touched - they must be felt with the heart. - Helen Keller
Don't be afraid to give up the good to go for the great. - John D. Rockefeller
The only way to do great work is to love what you do. If you haven't found it yet
column2: keep looking. Don't settle." - Steve Jobs 6. "I'm not afraid of storms
column3: for I'm learning to sail my ship. - Louisa May Alcott

column1: The only limit to our realization of tomorrow will be our doubts of today. - Franklin D. Roosevelt
The mind is everything. What you think you become. - Buddha
Success is not final
column2: failure is not fatal: it is the courage to continue that counts. - Winston Churchill

column1: Our greatest weakness lies in giving up. The most certain way to succeed is always to try just one more time. - Thomas Edison
I'm not lazy
I don't suffer from writer's block
column2: I enjoy extended periods of staring contemplatively at the ceiling. (George R.R. Martin)

column1: Procrastination is like credit card debt. It seems small at first
column2: but then it spirals out of control. (Charles M. Schulz)

column1: My therapist says I have a perfectionist complex. Doesn't that sound fancy? I just call it being really annoying. (Unknown)
I'm not saying I'm lazy
column2: but I once used a self-checkout lane to buy a single banana. (Michael Ian Black)
